Package main.java.neat.config

Enum NEATConfig.CONNECTIVITY

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<NEATConfig.CONNECTIVITY>
main.java.neat.config.NEATConfig.CONNECTIVITY
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<NEATConfig.CONNECTIVITY>, Constable
Enclosing class:
NEATConfig
public static enum NEATConfig.CONNECTIVITY extends Enum<NEATConfig.CONNECTIVITY>
Defines the initial connectivity patterns for creating new genomes. These patterns determine how nodes are connected when initializing a network, dramatically affecting the starting point for evolution.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Enum

    Enum.EnumDesc<E extends Enum<E>>

  • Enum Constant Summary

    Enum Constants
    Enum Constant
    Description
    FEATURE_SELECTION_NEAT_HIDDEN
    Selects one random input node and connects it to all hidden and output nodes.
    FEATURE_SELECTION_NEAT_NO_HIDDEN
    Selects one random input node and connects it to all output nodes.
    FULL_DIRECT
    Each input node is connected to all hidden and output nodes, and each hidden node is connected to all output nodes.
    FULL_NO_DIRECT
    Each input node is connected to all hidden and output nodes.
    LAYER_BY_LAYER
    Each layer is fully connected to the layer after it.
    PARTIAL_DIRECT
    Similar to FULL_DIRECT but each connection has a probability of being added [0, 1] controlled by the probConnectInit parameter.
    PARTIAL_NO_DIRECT
    Similar to FULL_NO_DIRECT but each connection has a probability of being added [0, 1] controlled by the probConnectInit parameter.
    UNCONNECTED
    Start with no connections.

  • Enum Constant Details

    • UNCONNECTED

      public static final NEATConfig.CONNECTIVITY UNCONNECTED
      Start with no connections. The network must evolve all connections from scratch.

    • FEATURE_SELECTION_NEAT_NO_HIDDEN

      public static final NEATConfig.CONNECTIVITY FEATURE_SELECTION_NEAT_NO_HIDDEN
      Selects one random input node and connects it to all output nodes. Implementation of feature-selective NEAT without hidden nodes.

    • FEATURE_SELECTION_NEAT_HIDDEN

      public static final NEATConfig.CONNECTIVITY FEATURE_SELECTION_NEAT_HIDDEN
      Selects one random input node and connects it to all hidden and output nodes. Implementation of feature-selective NEAT with hidden nodes.

    • LAYER_BY_LAYER

      public static final NEATConfig.CONNECTIVITY LAYER_BY_LAYER
      Each layer is fully connected to the layer after it. Creates a traditional layered neural network structure.

    • FULL_NO_DIRECT

      public static final NEATConfig.CONNECTIVITY FULL_NO_DIRECT
      Each input node is connected to all hidden and output nodes. If there are no hidden nodes, then each input node is connected to all output nodes. If feedforward parameter is set to false, then each hidden and output node will have a recurrent connection to itself.

    • FULL_DIRECT

      public static final NEATConfig.CONNECTIVITY FULL_DIRECT
      Each input node is connected to all hidden and output nodes, and each hidden node is connected to all output nodes. If feedforward parameter is set to false, then each hidden and output node will have a recurrent connection to itself.

    • PARTIAL_NO_DIRECT

      public static final NEATConfig.CONNECTIVITY PARTIAL_NO_DIRECT
      Similar to FULL_NO_DIRECT but each connection has a probability of being added [0, 1] controlled by the probConnectInit parameter.

    • PARTIAL_DIRECT

      public static final NEATConfig.CONNECTIVITY PARTIAL_DIRECT
      Similar to FULL_DIRECT but each connection has a probability of being added [0, 1] controlled by the probConnectInit parameter.
